title: Uhh I'm slightly worried
body:
Alrighty so I just played a game of Ahri and went extremely well, thing is that game the Yasuo accused me of Scripts then his team started to believe it (I ganked bot and thresh became sus...), at the start I wasn't worried but as the game went on it started to hit me hard, at the end game I was scared that I would be reported for something I didn't do. Pretty much all i'm saying is I don't want to be punished for false reports.   https://gyazo.com/c60dfbacf394f81aabdc47ee110a0e3c
You might think this post is a bit silly but i'm just very paranoid... I just don't want anything to happen to my account...

replies.body:
Hey there,

You don't have to worry, false reports (especially those for cheating) will have no affect on you.

Reports for cheating are under more scrutiny than those for unsportsmanlike conduct, etc are and are not dealt with by the automated system unlike reports for unsportsmanlike conduct

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=y6mMrwz4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-15T09:55:10.217+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> You don't have to worry, false reports (especially those for cheating) will have no affect on you.

Thanks so much, Ive been sitting here for an hour now refreshing the page waiting a response!
